channel.title: Galleries on cv19res
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on cv19res

item.title: teach
item.description: With the information gathered through our system, we can help people and communities to make informed decisions when faced with uncertainty regarding the current situation. The information provided would allow for the minimization of movement restrictions through the distribution of people to the appropriate health care facilities without overloading them.

item.title: tech
item.description: With the help of information and privacy technologies, we are able to inform governmental decision makers regarding the current COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: test
item.description: Through a consortium of renowned research facilities and their combined efforts and expertise, we are able to increase the current amount of testing for the COVID-19 infection. The information gathered from this testing will allow people and communities to quarantine more efficiently, accelerating the recovery of both the local economy and the well being of the population.

item.title: track
item.description: By collecting accurate anonymized data about the spread of COVID-19, we can better predict its evolution, thus allowing the local authorities and health care providers to be prepared for surges in infection while simultaneously keeping everyone’s privacy.
